content: to the left two row below 0 chain chain row 0 is only necessary if this chart makes up part of your bottom shelf notes - column 41 should only be worked if this chart is the last leftmost chart on your shelf - the unnumbered columns marked a and b are a guide to show which colour should be used for that row and should not be worked - stitches in the opposite colour to the row will be always be single_crochet blo for this reason it is not necessary to pay attention to the colour of a given stitch when reading the chart only the symbol matters - sometimes more than one stitch will be worked into the same front loop such as when a rdc follows a double_crochet or a double_crochet follows a ldc some front loops will be skipped entirely such as when a ldc follows a double_crochet izzy and frog horse bookend motif page 3/10 written pattern for chart 1 horse facing left right handed notes - column 41 should only be worked if this is the last leftmost pattern on your shelf instructions for column 41 will be included in square brackets and italics - all single_crochet should be in back loop only - all double_crochet including ldc and rdc should be in front loop only - all odd numbered row will be worked in colour a - all even numbered row will be worked in colour b other than row 0 which will be worked in colour a - sometimes more than one stitch will be worked into the same front loop such as when a rdc follows a double_crochet or a double_crochet follows a ldc some front loops will be skipped entirely such as when a ldc follows a double_crochet if this is the first shelf in your bookcase start at row 0 if this will be worked into pre-existing crochet start at row 1b row 0 in colour a ch41 ch1 turn your work 41 42 row 16 in colour b 8sc 10rdc 4sc 1rdc 3sc 1dc 1sc 4dc *1sc 1dc repeat from * 3 times 2dc 1sc row 1a starting in the second chain from the hook single_crochet in every chain 40 41 go to row 2 row 17 in colour a 8dc 12sc 2dc 2sc 2dc 1sc 1dc 4sc *1dc 3sc repeat from * 2 times 1dc row 1b in colour a 40sc 1sc 40 41 row 18 in colour b 11sc 10rdc 1sc 1ldc 3sc 1dc 1sc 4dc from this point the work should not be turned all row *1sc 3dc repeat from * 2 times 1sc should be worked from right to left on the same side the stitch count of every row should be 40 41 row 19 in colour a 11dc 12sc 3dc 1sc 1dc 4sc *1dc 3sc repeat from * 2 times 1dc row 2 in colour b single_crochet in every stitch row 20 in colour b 13sc 8rdc 5sc 1dc 1sc 4dc *1sc
